title: test_annex_copy_to failed for me while building 0.11.1 for trusty (nd14.04) only
body:
I didn't find any record of this failing before, so decided to document
```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo.test_annex_copy_to
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 772, in newfunc
    t(*(arg + (uri,)), **kw)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 596, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/tests/test_annexrepo.py", line 1343, in test_annex_copy_to
    eq_(repo.copy_to(["copied2", "copied1", "existed"], "target"),
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 313, in newfunc
    result = func(self, files_new, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 3237, in copy_to
    files, ['--in', 'here', '--not', '--in', remote])
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1411, in _get_expected_files
    'find', opts=expr, files=files
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 2410, in _run_annex_command_json
    **kwargs)
  File "/build/datalad-0.11.1/.pybuild/pythonX.Y_2.7/build/datalad/support/tests/test_annexrepo.py", line 1334, in ok_copy
    assert_in('copied1', kwargs['annex_options'])
AssertionError: 'copied1' not found in ['--json', '--in', 'here', '--not', '--in', 'target', '--', 'copied2']
```


edit 1: failed to replicate in local trusty chroot -- might be some fluke/race in our tests/annex
